Package ohos.agp.animation

Class Animator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.Animator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatorGroup, AnimatorProperty, AnimatorValue

    public abstract class Animator
extends Object
    Base class of an animator.

    This class provides basic support for animators. Besides starting, stopping, pausing, and resuming the animator, it allows you to obtain the animator duration, startup delay, repetition times, and specified curve types.

    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Animator.CurveType
      Provides curve types supported by the system.
      static interface  Animator.LoopedListener
      Listens for animator repeat events.
      static interface  Animator.StateChangedListener
      Listens for animator state changes.
      static interface  Animator.TimelineCurve
      Provides the method to obtain the value that represents a fraction in the timeline curve based on the specified time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int INFINITE
      Indicates an animator that repeats constantly.
      protected Animator.LoopedListener mLoopedListener
      Indicates the callback invoked when repeating an animator.
      protected Animator.StateChangedListener mPauseListener
      Indicates the callback invoked when pausing or resuming an animator.
      protected Animator.StateChangedListener mStartListener
      Indicates the callback invoked when starting an animator.

      • pause

        public void pause​()
        Pauses an animator. This method is valid only when an animator is running.
        See Also:
        resume()

        public void resume​()
        Resumes an animator. This method is valid only when an animator is paused.
        See Also:
        pause()

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused​()
        Checks if an animator is paused.
        Returns:
        Returns True if the animator is paused; returns False otherwise.

        Returns:

        protected void setDurationInternal​(long duration)

        Parameters:

        Sets the startup delay of an animator.
        Parameters:
        startDelay - Specifies the startup delay of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.

      • setLoopedCountInternal

        protected void setLoopedCountInternal​(int loopedCount)
        Specifies the repetition times of an animator.
        Parameters:
        loopedCount - Specifies the repetition times of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, or INFINITE.

      • setCurveTypeInternal

        Sets the curve type.
        Parameters:
        curveType - Specifies the curve type. Ensure that the specified type is supported in the system.
